CustomField.description: When applicable, indicates nature of entity and work within the clinical space, used for segmentation
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates the account's work within the clinical space; values are region specific and used for segmentation. Terms and regional use: "Clinical" (All); "Non Clinical" (All); "Healthcare Prime" (AMR); "IVD Partner" (GC); "Platform Distributor" (GC).
CustomField.label: Clinical Type
